text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump Bunch of bullshit. #Dump cares more about his ratings than American lives. He’s sabotaging the recovery by preventing more testing. Manipulative Trump is terrified of widespread coronavirus testing https://t.co/3OmepEM9rR
